name: Start a user migration

params.name: repositories
params.description: An array of repositories to include in the migration.

params.name: lock_repositories
params.description: Locks the `repositories` to prevent changes during the migration when set to `true`.

params.name: exclude_attachments
params.description: Does not include attachments uploaded to GitHub.com in the migration data when set to `true`. Excluding attachments will reduce the migration archive file size.

description: Initiates the generation of a user migration archive.
